about_the_game:
Don't want to grind? Get all [Valentine 2021] decorations for a slight bargain with this DLC!

Included Items:
  • Pink Frame
  • Love Letter Sticker
  • Twinkle Ceiling Drapes
  • Mailbox Neon
  • Valentines Bouquet
  • Valentine Table Set
  • Floral Tip Jar
  • Love Birds
  • Cupid’s Arrow
  • Plum Heart

**PLEASE NOTE:
If you already own any item from the list, purchasing this DLC will not provide you an extra set/ duplicate nor be discounted off of the final price. You will only receive the items you have yet to obtain.
